𒂆 ≈ 𒐈𒐺𒁹

𒂈 yoke <> 𒂇 𒂆 AGA Ecke Egge arc 𓊋 ⇔ arm
𒂇 AGA axe 𒂆 AGA3 ax ≈ 𒐈𒐺𒁹

𒂈 MIR šešig = yoke | 𒂇 mir (mer) [347x] = north 𓎔 #mḥ® ☑

𒂈 DUN in 𒋙 𒂈 šú.DUN

𒂈 ŠUDUN ≈ 𒋗𒁕 DAᵘᵐ

𒂈 ŠUDUN ζυγόν zugón Zügeln zgjedhë™ ☑ "yoke(s)"

𒄑𒋙𒂈 GIŠ.ŠUDUN "yoke" süden vs norden ≈ 𒂈 #niri™
